title: Looking to Buy These SGC 40-50 T206s
author: AndyG09

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy These SGC 40-50 T206s
posts.post_content:
Hello friends. I was hoping to add some T206s to my collection.  I need 33 more to get to 518.  I'm hoping you have SGC graded (no thanks on PSA) 40-60, with nice eye appeal preferred. If you can help me out, please send scans and asking prices to: [url]andygarden09@yahoo.com[/url]

Wantlist:

Bay
Cobb (Bat On, Green)
Coles
Davis, Harry (H. Davis)
Dunn, Jack
Elberfeld (Both Port.)
Flanagan
Greminger
Hickman
Keeler (Batting)
Lafitte
Lajoie (Bat, Throwing)
Manion
Matty Port.
McCormick
McGraw (Port. W/Cap)
Mullaney
Needham
Purtell
Shaughnessy
Smith (Carlos and Sid)
Tinker (Both Bat, Port.)
Violat
C. Young (All 3)

Thanks!

Andy

Landed one!  Looking for more!

Best,

Andy

Andy,

After getting blanked on Ebay tonight, was hoping I could find something here.

Best,

A dozen or so days before my birthday. Thought I would start looking early for a gift.

Best,

Peter, 

Send me a scan bro.  Matt Harvey lookin good!!!

I'm looking for SGC graded (no thanks on PSA) 40-60, with nice eye appeal preferred.
